description: Matt's the last one in the office while everyone else has left for the holiday weekend and he's trying to finish his work as fast as he can. Jordan notices that nobody is in the office and begins to entice Matt by kissing on him. Matt is fully distracted now and only wants his man. They start to passionately make out while taking their clothes off in the office room. Matt gets down on his knees to thank Jordan properly. They both swap some sexy blow jobs on the desk until Matt flips himself upside down ass up in the air for Jordan. Jordan loves the acrobatics and buries his face deep in that sexy smooth ass of his. You can only hold that amazing position for so long but it was perfect timing cause now Jordan is ready to fuck his man's ass. Jordan bends him over his office desk and pounds his sweet hole until they both cum all over the place.  Enjoy!
title: Office Stress Release
